using System.Data.Common;

namespace AsyncGenerator.Tests.AsyncReturnType.Input
{
	using System.Threading.Tasks;
	using System.Threading;
	public partial class NullCoalescing
	{
		public async Task VariablesAsync(CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(CancellationToken))
		{
			var connection = GetConnection();
			var trx = (connection == null ? null : await (connection.BeginTransactionAsync(cancellationToken)));
			var disposeTask = trx?.DisposeAsync();
			if (disposeTask.HasValue)
			{
				await (disposeTask.Value);
			}
		}
	}
}
